TopicTitle: How do you download the latest KSP?

Articles.Content: I just got back my laptop after months of repair and I'm desperate to update KSP (Mac OS X). I never know how to do that... do I download the demo? Or do I go to the shop? The launcher that comes with KSP is useless, it crashes and freezes and has never updated KSP. I know it's silly not to know how to updtae KSP but I wish there was a 'Download' section where you can just grab the latest version.
